name: Rocketjumper (Wuppos, Mr Paconieen)
description:
Rocketjumper

You have been stranded in a strange place. The hope is to activate the distress beacon, but this will attract the monsters as well. Take your trusty rocket launcher and fight, explode, create chaos! How long can you survive?

  • Rocket jumping.
  • Explosions & destructible terrain.
  • Endlessy increasing diffculty. The game won't stop if you won't stop.
  • Highscore based. Can you beat our 2700?

Made by two brothers for the Brackeys game jam 2021.
